biotools.summary: Integrative platform for the analysis of Transcriptomics, Proteomics and Genomics data with advanced functional profiling. It integrates primary (normalization, calls, etc.) and secondary (signatures, predictors, associations, TDTs, clustering, etc.) analysis tools within an environment that allows relating genomic data and/or interpreting them by means of different functional enrichment or gene set methods.
